article.title: Nvidia's Biggest Skeptic Sees Its Shares Losing 10% in 2025 -- Is Wall Street Overlooking Tangible Concerns With This Artificial Intelligence (AI) Leader?
article.content: A perfect storm may be brewing for Wall Street's leading AI stock in the new year.
